trans-unit.source: HTML attribute reference
trans-unit.target: HTML属性参考

trans-unit.source: HTML consists of elements, each of which may be modified by some number of attributes. HTML documents are connected to each other with links.
trans-unit.target: HTML由元素组成，每个元素都可以通过一定数量的属性进行修改。HTML文档通过链接相互连接。

trans-unit.source: HTML content
trans-unit.target: HTML内容

trans-unit.source: HTML element reference
trans-unit.target: HTML元素参考

trans-unit.source: HTML elements
trans-unit.target: HTML元素

trans-unit.source: HTML elements are usually "inline" or "block-level" elements. An inline element occupies only the space bounded by the tags that define it. A block-level element occupies the entire space of its parent element (container), thereby creating a "block."
trans-unit.target: HTML元素通常是 "内联 "或 "块级 "元素。一个内联元素只占用定义它的标签所限定的空间,而一个块级元素则占用其父元素(容器)的整个空间,从而形成 "块"。块级元素占用其父元素(容器)的整个空间,从而形成一个 "块"。

trans-unit.source: HTML forms
trans-unit.target: HTML表格

trans-unit.source: HTML forms guide
trans-unit.target: HTML表格指南

trans-unit.source: HTML in summaries
trans-unit.target: 摘要中的HTML

trans-unit.source: HTML is comprised of several kinds of content, each of which is allowed to be used in certain contexts and is disallowed in others. Similarly, each has a set of other content categories they can contain and elements which can or can't be used in them. This is a guide to these categories.
trans-unit.target: HTML由几种内容组成,每种内容在某些情况下可以使用,而在其他情况下则不允许使用。同样,每一种内容都有一组它们可以包含的其他内容类别,以及可以或不可以在其中使用的元素。这就是这些类别的指南。

trans-unit.source: HTML media support in Firefox
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox中支持HTML媒体

trans-unit.source: HTML note with additional information about the contact. Plural. Each element is some kind of object.
trans-unit.target: HTML注释，其中包含有关该联系人的其他信息。复数。每个元素都是某种对象。

trans-unit.source: HTML offers a selection of elements which help to create interactive user interface objects.
trans-unit.target: HTML提供了一系列有助于创建交互式用户界面对象的元素。

trans-unit.source: HTML provides a crossorigin attribute for images that, in combination with an appropriate CORS header, allows images defined by the <img> element that are loaded from foreign origins to be used in a <canvas> as if they had been loaded from the current origin.
trans-unit.target: HTML 为图像提供了 crossorigin 属性，该图像与适当的CORS标头结合使用，允许 <img> 元素定义的从外部来源加载的图像在 <canvas> 中使用，就像它们是从当前来源加载的一样。

trans-unit.source: HTML provides a number of elements which can be used together to create forms which the user can fill out and submit to the Web site or application. There's a great deal of further information about this available in the HTML forms guide.
trans-unit.target: HTML提供了许多元素，可以一起使用这些元素来创建表单，用户可以填写这些表单并提交给网站或应用程序。HTML表单指南中提供了大量有关此方面的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: HTML reference
trans-unit.target: HTML参考

trans-unit.source: HTML supports various multimedia resources such as images, audio, and video.
trans-unit.target: HTML支持图片、音频、视频等各种多媒体资源。

trans-unit.source: HTML tables
trans-unit.target: HTML表格

trans-unit.source: HTML uses "markup" to annotate text, images, and other content for display in a Web browser. HTML markup includes special "elements" such as <head>, <title>, <body>, <header>, <footer>, <article>, <section>, <p>, <div>, <span>, <img>, <aside>, <audio>, <canvas>, <datalist>, <details>, <embed>, <nav>, <output>, <progress>, <video> and many others.
trans-unit.target: HTML使用“标记”来注释文本，图像和其他内容，以在Web浏览器中显示。 HTML标记包括特殊的“元素”，例如 <head> ， <title> ， <body> ， <header> ， <footer> ， <article> ， <section> ， <p> ， <div> ， <span> ， <img> ， <aside> ， <audio> ， <canvas> ， <datalist> ， <details> ， <embed> ， <nav> ， <output> ， <progress> ， <video> 等。

trans-unit.source: HTML5
trans-unit.target: HTML5

trans-unit.source: HTML5 Cache Manifest: An Off-label Usage
trans-unit.target: HTML5 Cache Manifest。一种非标示的用法

trans-unit.source: HTML5 Canvas Accessibility in Firefox 13 – by Steve Faulkner
trans-unit.target: Firefox 13中的HTML5 Canvas可访问性–作者Steve Faulkner

trans-unit.source: HTML5 context menus in Firefox (Screencast and Code)
trans-unit.target: 火狐浏览器中的HTML5上下文菜单(截屏和代码)

trans-unit.source: HTML5 supports several media elements. The <video> and <audio> elements may be used singly or combined with the <source> element. A short example illustrates. Although the <video> and <audio> elements both contain src attributes, this sample uses the <source> element to offer video files in multiple formats, allowing each browser to select an element that it supports.
trans-unit.target: HTML5支持多种媒体元素。所述 <video> 和 <audio> 元件可以单独使用，或者与所述组合 <source> 元素。一个简短的例子说明了这一点。尽管 <video> 和 <audio> 元素都包含src属性，但是此示例使用 <source> 元素提供多种格式的视频文件，从而允许每个浏览器选择它支持的元素。

trans-unit.source: HTML5: This value can be overridden by a formtarget attribute on a <button> or <input> element.
trans-unit.target: HTML5：此值可以被 <button> 或 <input> 元素上的 formtarget 属性覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Having a second row of <th> elements that contains only the "Joined" and "Canceled" headings. Because the other columns are already occupied by first-row cells that span into the second row, these wind up correctly positioned under the "Membership Dates" heading.
trans-unit.target: 第二行的 <th> 元素仅包含“ Joined”和“ Canceled”标题。因为其他列已经被跨到第二行的第一行单元格占用，所以这些单元格正确地定位在“成员资格日期”标题下。

trans-unit.source: Having selected our base color, we need to build out our palette. We decide to use Paletton to come up with the other colors we need. Upon opening Paletton, we see:
trans-unit.target: 选择我们的基础颜色后，我们需要构建调色板。我们决定使用Paletton提出我们需要的其他颜色。打开Paletton后，我们看到：

trans-unit.source: Having the first row's "Membership Dates" heading cell span two columns using the colspan attribute, which causes this heading to actually be two columns wide.
trans-unit.target: 使用 colspan 属性使第一行的“ Membership Dates”标题单元格跨越两列，这实际上使该标题宽了两列。

trans-unit.source: Having the first row's "Name", "ID", and "Balance" heading cells span two rows using the rowspan attribute, making them each be two rows tall.
trans-unit.target: 使用 rowspan 属性，使第一行的“名称”，“ ID”和“余额”标题单元格跨越两行，使它们各为两行。

trans-unit.source: Heading Elements
trans-unit.target: 标题元素

trans-unit.source: Heading information may be used by user agents, for example, to construct a table of contents for a document automatically.
trans-unit.target: 例如,用户代理可以使用标题信息来自动构建文档的目录。

trans-unit.source: Heading levels 1-6.
trans-unit.target: 1-6级标题:

trans-unit.source: Headings
trans-unit.target: Headings

trans-unit.source: Headings • Page Structure • WAI Web Accessibility Tutorials
trans-unit.target: 标题•页面结构•WAI Web Accessibility教程

trans-unit.source: Headings may be nested as subsections to reflect the organization of the content of the page. Most screen readers can also generate an ordered list of all the headings on a page, which can help a person quickly determine the hierarchy of the content:
trans-unit.target: 标题可以嵌套为子栏目,以反映页面内容的组织结构。大多数屏幕阅读器还可以生成一个页面上所有标题的有序列表,这可以帮助人们快速确定内容的层次结构。

trans-unit.source: Helps define the language of an element: the language that non-editable elements are in, or the language that editable elements should be written in by the user. The attribute contains one “language tag” (made of hyphen-separated “language subtags”) in the format defined in Tags for Identifying Languages (BCP47). xml:lang has priority over it.
trans-unit.target: 帮助定义元素的语言：不可编辑元素所使用的语言，或者用户应使用可编辑元素编写的语言。该属性包含一个“语言标签”（由连字符分隔的“语言子标签”组成），格式为“识别语言的标签”（BCP47）中定义的格式。xml：lang具有优先权。

trans-unit.source: Here are a few examples demonstrating the use of the <iframe> element.
trans-unit.target: 以下是一些示例，演示了 <iframe> 元素的用法。

trans-unit.source: Here are some sample colors in HSL notation:
trans-unit.target: 下面是一些HSL符号的颜色样本。

trans-unit.source: Here are two inputs that take a password, each with a placeholder:
trans-unit.target: 这里有两个采取密码的输入,每个输入都有一个占位符。

trans-unit.source: Here however, we will use a rel value of preload, which turns the <link> element into a preloader for pretty much any resource we want. At a basic level, you also need to specify the path to the resource to be preloaded in the href attribute, and the type of resource you are preloading in the as attribute.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在这里，我们将使用 rel 值 preload ，它将 <link> 元素变成预加载器，用于几乎任何我们想要的资源。在基本级别上，还需要在 href 属性中指定要预加载的资源的路径，并在 as 属性中指定要预加载的资源的类型。

trans-unit.source: Here is a simple example of using the <content> element. It is an HTML file with everything needed in it.
trans-unit.target: 这是使用 <content> 元素的简单示例。这是一个HTML文件，其中包含所有需要的内容。

trans-unit.source: Here is an example form submission as it would be delivered to a CGI program by the HTTP server:
trans-unit.target: 这里是一个表单提交的例子,它将由HTTP服务器传递给CGI程序。

trans-unit.source: Here is the result of this code:
trans-unit.target: 这是这个代码的结果。

trans-unit.source: Here we are preloading our CSS and JavaScript files so they will be available as soon as they are required during the rendering of the page later on. This example is somewhat trivial, but the benefits can be seen much more clearly, the later in the rendering the resources are discovered and the larger they are. For example, what about resources that are pointed to from inside a CSS file like fonts or images, or larger images and video files?
trans-unit.target: 这里我们是在预加载我们的CSS和JavaScript文件,这样在后面的页面渲染过程中一旦需要它们就可以使用。这个例子有些微不足道,但好处可以看得更清楚,在渲染的后期发现资源,而且资源越大越好。比如,从CSS文件里面指向的资源,比如字体或图片,或者更大的图片和视频文件,怎么办?

trans-unit.source: Here we dig into the last row of the table's header block and give the first header cell in it (the "Joined" header) a greenish color, and the second header cell in it (the "Canceled" header) a reddish hue.
trans-unit.target: 这里我们挖掘表头块的最后一行,给其中的第一个表头单元格("已加入 "表头)赋予绿色,给其中的第二个表头单元格("已取消 "表头)赋予红色。

trans-unit.source: Here we have an email input with the ID emailAddress which is allowed to be up to a maximum of 256 characters long. The input box itself is physically 64 characters wide, and displays the text user@example.gov as a placeholder anytime the field is empty. In addition, by using the multiple attribute, the box is configured to allow the user to enter zero or more e-mail addresses, separated by commas, as described in Allowing multiple e-mail addresses. As a final touch, the list attribute contains the ID of a <datalist> whose <option>s specify a set of suggested values the user can choose from.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们有一个ID为 emailAddress 的电子邮件输入，该电子邮件输入的最大长度为256个字符。输入框本身实际为64个字符宽，并且在该字段为空时会显示文本 user@example.gov 作为占位符。此外，通过使用 multiple 属性，该框配置为允许用户输入零个或多个电子邮件地址，以逗号分隔，如允许多个电子邮件地址中所述。最后， list 属性包含 <datalist> 的ID，其 <option> 指定了一组用户可以选择的建议值。

trans-unit.source: Here we see a standard disclosure widget with the label "System Requirements", in its default closed state. When the user clicks on the widget, or focuses it then presses the space bar, it "twists" open, revealing its contents:
trans-unit.target: 在这里,我们看到了一个标准的信息披露部件,带有 "系统要求 "标签,处于默认的关闭状态。当用户点击小部件,或者聚焦它,然后按空格键,它就会 "扭曲 "打开,显示出它的内容。

trans-unit.source: Here we see examples showing the use of <big> followed by an example showing how to accomplish the same results using modern CSS syntax instead.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们看到显示 <big> 用法的示例，然后显示如何使用现代CSS语法实现相同结果的示例。

trans-unit.source: Here we see the definition — now with an id attribute, "definition-dfn", which can be used as the target of a link. Later on, a link is created using <a> with the href attribute set to "#definition-dfn" to set up the link back to the definition.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们看到了定义-现在具有 id 属性 "definition-dfn" ，该属性可用作链接的目标。稍后，使用 <a> 创建一个链接，并将 href 属性设置为 "#definition-dfn" 以建立指向该定义的链接。

trans-unit.source: Here we see the most basic password input, with a label established using the <label> element.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们看到了最基本的密码输入，其中包含使用 <label> 元素建立的标签。

trans-unit.source: Here we use the :invalid and :valid pseudo classes to display an appropriate invalid or valid icon as generated content on the adjacent <span> element, indicating if the current value is valid. We put it on a separate <span> element for added flexibility; some browsers don't display generated content very effectively on some types of form inputs (read for example the section on <input type="date"> validation).
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们使用 :invalid 和 :valid 伪类在相邻的 <span> 元素上显示适当的无效或有效图标作为生成的内容，指示当前值是否有效。我们将其放在单独的 <span> 元素上以增加灵活性；一些浏览器不能在某些类型的表单输入上非常有效地显示生成的内容（例如，阅读 <input type="date"> 验证一节）。

trans-unit.source: Here we've added the border-spacing and border-collapse properties to eliminate spacing between cells and collapse borders that touch one another to be a single border instead of winding up with double borders.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们添加了 border-spacing 和 border-collapse 属性，以消除单元格之间的间距和折叠彼此接触的边框成为单个边框，而不是使用双边框结束。

trans-unit.source: Here you see the three radio buttons, each with the name set to "contact" and each with a unique value that uniquely identifies that individual radio button within the group. They each also have a unique id, which is used by the <label> element's for attribute to associate the labels with the radio buttons.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，您将看到三个单选按钮，每个单选按钮的 name 设置为 "contact" ，每个单选按钮均具有唯一标识组中该单个单选按钮的唯一 value 。它们每个都有一个唯一的 id ， <label> 元素的 for 属性使用该ID将标签与单选按钮相关联。

trans-unit.source: Here's a brief review of how media elements are referenced in HTML. For more details see the articles for each element.
trans-unit.target: 以下是对HTML中媒体元素如何引用的简要回顾。更多细节请参见每个元素的文章。

trans-unit.target: 这是一个简单的示例，使用 <var> 表示数学方程式中的变量名称。

trans-unit.source: Here's an example that watches changes over time to the color value:
trans-unit.target: 这里有一个例子,随着时间的推移,手表的颜色值会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: Here's the CSS used in the above example. Here we make use of the :valid and :invalid CSS properties to style the input based on whether or not the current value is valid. We had to put the icons on a <span> next to the input, not on the input itself, because in Chrome the generated content is placed inside the form control, and can't be styled or shown effectively.
trans-unit.target: 这是上面示例中使用的CSS。在这里，我们利用 :valid 和 :invalid CSS属性根据当前值是否有效来设置输入的样式。我们必须将图标放在输入旁边的 <span> 上，而不是输入本身上，因为在Chrome中，生成的内容位于表单控件内，无法有效地设置样式或显示。

trans-unit.source: Here, object-position is configured to draw the image at the top-right corner of the element, while object-fit is set to contain, which indicates that the image should be drawn at the largest size that will fit within the element's box without altering its aspect ratio. Note the visible grey background of the element still visible in the area not covered by the image.

trans-unit.source: Hexadecimal string notation
trans-unit.target: 十六进制字符串符号

trans-unit.source: Hexadecimal string notation represents a color using hexadecimal digits to represent each of the color components (red, green, and blue). It may also include a fourth component: the alpha channel (or opacity). Each color component can be represented as a number between 0 and 255 (0x00 and 0xFF) or, optionally, as a number between 0 and 15 (0x0 and 0xF). All components must be specified using the same number of digits. If you use the single-digit notation, the final color is computed by using each component's digit twice; that is, "#D" becomes "#DD" when drawing.
trans-unit.target: 十六进制字符串表示法使用十六进制数字表示颜色，以表示每种颜色分量（红色，绿色和蓝色）。它还可能包括第四个成分：alpha通道（或不透明度）。每个颜色分量都可以表示为0到255之间的数字（0x00到0xFF），也可以表示为0到15之间的数字（0x0到0xF）。必须使用相同的数字位数指定所有组件。如果使用一位数符号，则通过使用每个组件的位数两次来计算最终颜色；即，绘制时 "#D" 变为 "#DD" 。

trans-unit.source: Hidden elements shouldn't be linked from non-hidden elements, and elements that are descendants of a hidden element are still active, which means that script elements can still execute and form elements can still submit. Elements and scripts may, however, refer to elements that are hidden in other contexts.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏的元素不应该从非隐藏的元素中链接出来,作为隐藏元素的后裔的元素仍然是活跃的,这意味着脚本元素仍然可以执行,表单元素仍然可以提交。然而,元素和脚本可能会引用其他上下文中隐藏的元素。

trans-unit.source: Hidden inputs are also used to store and submit security tokens or secrets, for the purposes of improving website security. The basic idea is that if a user is filling in a sensitive form, such as a form on their banking website to transfer some money to another account, the secret they would be provided with would prove that they are who they say they are, and that they are using the correct form to submit the transfer request.
trans-unit.target: Hidden inputs are also used to store and submit security tokens or secrets, for the purposes of improving website security. The basic idea is that if a user is filling in a sensitive form, such as a form on their banking website to transfer some money to another account, the secret they would be provided with would prove that they are who they say they are, and that they are using the correct form to submit the transfer request.

trans-unit.source: Hidden inputs don't participate in constraint validation; they have no real value to be constrained.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏的输入不参与约束验证,它们没有实际的约束价值。

trans-unit.source: Historically, Firefox has allowed keyboard and mouse events to bubble up from the <option> element to the parent <select> element, although this behavior is inconsistent across many browsers. For better Web compatibility (and for technical reasons), when Firefox is in multi-process mode and the <select> element is displayed as a drop-down list. The behavior is unchanged if the <select> is presented inline and it has either the multiple attribute defined or a size attribute set to more than 1. Rather than watching <option> elements for events, you should watch for change events on <select>. See bug 1090602 for details.
trans-unit.target: 从历史上看，Firefox允许键盘和鼠标事件从 <option> 元素冒到父 <select> 元素，尽管这种行为在许多浏览器中都是不一致的。为了更好的Web兼容性（以及出于技术原因），当Firefox处于多进程模式并且 <select> 元素显示为下拉列表时。如果 <select> 以内联方式显示，并且定义了 multiple 属性或 size 属性设置为大于 1 ,则该行为不变。您应该注意 <select> 上的更改事件，而不是注意事件的 <option> 元素。。有关详细信息，请参见错误1090602。

trans-unit.source: Historically, Firefox has allowed keyboard and mouse events to bubble up from the <option> element to the parent <select> element, although this behavior is inconsistent across many browsers. For better Web compatibility (and for technical reasons), when Firefox is in multi-process mode the <select> element is displayed as a drop-down list. The behavior is unchanged if the <select> is presented inline and it has either the multiple attribute defined or a size attribute set to more than 1. Rather than watching <option> elements for events, you should watch for change events on <select>. See bug 1090602 for details.
trans-unit.target: 从历史上看，Firefox允许键盘和鼠标事件从 <option> 元素冒到父 <select> 元素，尽管这种行为在许多浏览器中都是不一致的。为了更好的Web兼容性（以及出于技术原因），当Firefox处于多进程模式时， <select> 元素显示为下拉列表。如果 <select> 以内联方式显示并且定义了multi属性或size属性设置为1以上，则行为不会改变。您应该监视 <select> 上的change事件，而不是监视 <option> 元素的事件。。有关详细信息，请参见错误1090602。

trans-unit.source: Historically, the <embed> element could be used with audio player plug-ins to play audio in the background in most browsers. However, even this is no longer appropriate, and you should use <audio> instead, since it's more capable, more compatible, and doesn't require plug-ins.
trans-unit.target: 从历史上看， <embed> 元素可以与音频播放器插件一起使用，以在大多数浏览器中在后台播放音频。但是，即使这不再合适，您也应该改用 <audio> ，因为它更强大，更兼容并且不需要插件。

trans-unit.source: Historically, the <b> element was meant to make text boldface. Styling information has been deprecated since HTML4, so the meaning of the <b> element has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 从历史上看， <b> 元素用于使文本变为黑体。自HTML4以来，样式信息已被弃用，因此 <b> 元素的含义已更改。

trans-unit.source: Historically, this has been presented as a horizontal rule or line. While it may still be displayed as a horizontal rule in visual browsers, this element is now defined in semantic terms, rather than presentational terms, so if you wish to draw a horizontal line, you should do so using appropriate CSS.
trans-unit.target: 从历史上看,它一直是以水平规则或线条的形式显示的。虽然在可视化浏览器中,它可能仍会以水平规则的形式显示,但该元素现在是以语义术语而非表现术语来定义的,因此,如果您希望绘制一条水平线,您应该使用适当的CSS来绘制。

trans-unit.source: However, these properties don't produce a consistent result across browsers, and it is hard to do things like line different types of form element up with one another in a column. The <select> element's internal structure is complex, and hard to control. If you want to get full control, you should consider using a library with good facilities for styling form widgets (such as jQuery UI), or try rolling your own dropdown menu using non-semantic elements, JavaScript, and WAI-ARIA to provide semantics.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这些属性在浏览器之间不会产生一致的结果，并且很难完成将不同类型的表单元素在一行中彼此对齐的操作。所述 <select> 元件的内部结构复杂，并且难以控制。如果要完全控制，则应考虑使用具有良好功能的库来样式化表单小部件（例如jQuery UI），或尝试使用非语义元素，JavaScript和WAI-ARIA滚动自己的下拉菜单以提供语义。

trans-unit.source: IDL attributes are not always strings; for example, input.maxlength is a number (a signed long). When using IDL attributes, you read or set values of the desired type, so input.maxlength is always going to return a number and when you set input.maxlength ,it wants a number. If you pass another type, it is automatically converted to a number as specified by the standard JavaScript rules for type conversion.
trans-unit.target: IDL属性并不总是字符串。例如， input.maxlength 是一个数字（带符号的长整数）。使用IDL属性时，您将读取或设置所需类型的值，因此 input.maxlength 总是将返回一个数字，而当您设置 input.maxlength 时，它将需要一个数字。如果您传递其他类型，则它将自动转换为标准JavaScript规则所指定的数字以进行类型转换。

trans-unit.source: IDL attributes can reflect other types such as unsigned long, URLs, booleans, etc. Unfortunately, there are no clear rules and the way IDL attributes behave in conjunction with their corresponding content attributes depends on the attribute. Most of the time, it will follow the rules laid out in the specification, but sometimes it doesn't. HTML specifications try to make this as developer-friendly as possible, but for various reasons (mostly historical), some attributes behave oddly (select.size, for example) and you should read the specifications to understand how exactly they behave.
trans-unit.target: IDL属性可以反映其他类型，例如无符号长整数，URL，布尔值等。不幸的是，没有明确的规则，IDL属性与相应的内容属性结合使用的方式取决于该属性。在大多数情况下，它将遵循规范中列出的规则，但有时不遵循。HTML规范试图使它尽可能地对开发人员友好，但是由于各种原因（大多数是历史原因），某些属性的行为 select.size （例如select.size），您应该阅读规范以了解它们的行为。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs while trying to load or render an image, and an onerror event handler has been configured to handle the error event, that event handler will get called. This can happen in a number of situations, including:

trans-unit.source: If an icon is used in place of text to signify this kind of links behavior, make sure it includes an alternate description.

trans-unit.source: If automatic captioning services are used, it is important to review the generated content to ensure it accurately represents the source audio.

trans-unit.source: If it makes sense to separately syndicate the content of a <section> element, use an <article> element instead.

trans-unit.source: If multiple <base> elements are specified, only the first href and first target value are used; all others are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了多个 <base> 元素，则仅使用第一个href和第一个目标值。所有其他人都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If multiple files are selected, the string represents the first selected file. JavaScript can access the other files through the input's files property.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择了多个文件，则该字符串表示第一个选择的文件。JavaScript可以通过输入的 files 属性访问其他文件。

trans-unit.source: If no name is specified, or name is empty, the input's value is not submitted with the form.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 name ，或者 name 为空，则输入的值不会与表单一起提交。

trans-unit.source: If no descriptor is specified, the source is assigned the default descriptor: 1x.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定描述符，则为源分配默认描述符： 1x 。

trans-unit.source: If no file is yet selected, the string is "" (empty).
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未选择任何文件，则字符串为 "" （空）。

trans-unit.source: If no validation constraints are in place for the input (see Validation for more details), the value can be any text string or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果没有针对输入的验证约束（请参见“ 验证”以获取更多详细信息），则该值可以是任何文本字符串或空字符串（ "" ）。

trans-unit.source: If no validation constraints are in place for the input (see Validation for more details), the value may be an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果没有针对输入的验证约束（请参阅“ 验证”以获取更多详细信息），则该值可能为空字符串（“”）。

trans-unit.source: If no value is expressly set for align, the parent node's value is inherited.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为 align 明确设置任何值，则继承父节点的值。

trans-unit.source: If none are checked, the recipe name's checkbox is set to unchecked.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有勾选,则配方名称的复选框被设置为未勾选。

trans-unit.source: If none of the semantic elements are appropriate for your use case (for example, if you simply need to show some content in a non-proportional font), you should consider using the <span> element, styling it as desired using CSS. The font-family property is a good place to start.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有一个语义元素适合您的用例（例如，如果您只需要以非比例字体显示某些内容），则应考虑使用 <span> 元素，并根据需要使用CSS对其进行样式设置。该 font-family 属性是一个良好的开端。

trans-unit.source: If none specified, use the browser's locale.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,则使用浏览器的locale。

trans-unit.source: If not present and if no CSSlist-style-type property does apply to the element, the user agent decide to use a kind of bullets depending on the nesting level of the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在并且没有CSS list-style-type 属性确实适用于该元素，则用户代理根据列表的嵌套级别决定使用一种项目符号。

trans-unit.source: If not set, preload's default value is browser-defined (i.e. each browser may have its own default value). The spec advises it to be set to metadata.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，则 preload 的默认值是浏览器定义的（即，每个浏览器可能都有自己的默认值）。规范建议将其设置为 metadata 。

trans-unit.source: If not set, its default value is browser-defined (i.e. each browser may have its own default value). The spec advises it to be set to metadata.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，则其默认值是浏览器定义的（即每个浏览器可能有其自己的默认值）。规范建议将其设置为 metadata 。

trans-unit.source: If one or several up link types are also present, the number of these up indicates the depth of the current page in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个或几个 up 链接类型也存在，这些数量 up 表示当前页面的层次结构中的深度。

trans-unit.source: If one or two are checked, the recipe name's checkbox is set to indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: 如果选中一个或两个，则配方名称的复选框设置为 indeterminate 。

trans-unit.source: If overridden, it is important to ensure that the state change when focus is moved to the button is high enough that people experiencing low vision conditions will be able to perceive it.
trans-unit.target: 如果覆盖,必须确保焦点移动到按钮时的状态变化足够高,遇到低视力情况的人能够感知。

trans-unit.source: If present, its value must be an ASCII case-insensitive match for "utf-8". Both it’s unnecessary to specify the charset attribute, because documents must use UTF-8, and the script element inherits its character encoding from the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，则其值必须为“ utf-8 ” 的ASCII区分大小写的匹配项。都不需要指定 charset 属性，因为文档必须使用UTF-8，并且 script 元素从文档继承其字符编码。

trans-unit.source: If present, this Boolean attribute indicates that the option is initially selected. If the <option> element is the descendant of a <select> element whose multiple attribute is not set, only one single <option> of this <select> element may have the selected attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，则此布尔属性表示最初选择了该选项。如果 <option> 元件是后裔 <select> 元素，其 multiple 属性未设置中，只有一个单 <option> 的此 <select> 元素可具有 selected 属性。

trans-unit.source: If provided, this string is used instead of the fn or n property to determine the sort order for the card. This can be useful in cases where the locale of the contact's name has different sorting rules than other names in the user's contact database.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供此字符串，则使用该字符串代替 fn 或 n 属性来确定卡的排序顺序。在联系人姓名的语言环境与用户联系人数据库中其他姓名的排序规则不同的情况下，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If providing higher-density versions of an image for high-DPI (Retina) display, use srcset on the <img> element instead. This lets browsers opt for lower-density versions in data-saving modes, and you don't have to write explicit media conditions.
trans-unit.target: 如果为高DPI（Retina）显示提供更高密度的图像版本， srcset 在 <img> 元素上使用srcset。这样一来，浏览器就可以在数据保存模式下选择低密度版本，而无需编写明确的 media 条件。

trans-unit.source: If set to no, the user is not able to zoom in the webpage. The default is yes. Browser settings can ignore this rule, and iOS10+ ignores it by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 no ，则用户将无法放大网页。默认值为 yes 。浏览器设置可以忽略此规则，默认情况下，iOS10 +会忽略它。

trans-unit.source: If specified as an empty string, this attribute enables extra restrictions on the content that can appear in the inline frame. The value of the attribute can either be an empty string (all the restrictions are applied), or a space-separated list of tokens that lift particular restrictions. Valid tokens are:

trans-unit.source: If specified, the value of the formenctype attribute overrides the owning form's action attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，则 formenctype 属性的值将覆盖拥有表单的 action 属性。

trans-unit.source: If specified, this attribute overrides the method attribute of the element's form owner.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，则此属性将覆盖元素的表单所有者的 method 属性。

trans-unit.source: If specified, this attribute overrides the method attribute of the button's form owner.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，则此属性将覆盖按钮的表单所有者的 method 属性。

trans-unit.source: If that isn't enough, you can use an aria-label attribute on the <input> itself. This should be a descriptive text label that will be read out by the screenreader; it's used as a non-visual equivalent to <label>.
trans-unit.target: 如果这还不够，您可以在 <input> 本身上使用 aria-label 属性。这应该是一个描述性的文本标签，屏幕阅读器会读出该标签；它用作 <label> 的非可视等效项。

trans-unit.source: If the <input> element's implementation of the "color" type on the user's browser doesn't support a color well, but is instead a text field for entering the color string directly, you can use the select() method to select the text currently in the edit field. If the browser instead uses a color well, select() does nothing. You should be aware of this behavior so your code can respond appropriately in either case.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <input> 元素在用户浏览器中对 "color" 类型的实现不能很好地支持颜色，而是直接用于输入颜色字符串的文本字段，则可以使用 select() 方法选择文本当前在编辑字段中。如果浏览器使用的颜色很好，则 select() 不会执行任何操作。您应该注意这种行为，以便您的代码在两种情况下都可以正确响应。

trans-unit.source: If the <dfn> contains a single child element and does not have any text content of its own, and the child element is an <abbr> element with a title attribute itself, then the exact value of the <abbr> element's title is the term being defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <dfn> 包含一个子元素，没有任何自己的文本内容，并且子元素是 <abbr> 与元素 title 属性本身，那么的精确值 <abbr> 元素的 title 是术语被定义。

trans-unit.source: If the <dfn> element has a title attribute, the value of the title attribute is considered to be the term being defined. The element must still have text within it, but that text may be an abbreviation (perhaps using <abbr>) or another form of the term.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <dfn> 元件具有 title 属性，所述的值 title 属性被认为是所定义的术语。该元素中仍必须包含文本，但是该文本可以是缩写（也许使用 <abbr> ）或该术语的另一种形式。

trans-unit.source: If the <dfn> element has a title attribute, then the term is the value of that attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <dfn> 元素具有 title 属性，则该术语就是该属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <dfn> element has a title attribute, it must contain the term being defined and no other text.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <dfn> 元素具有 title 属性，则它必须包含正在定义的术语，并且不得包含其他文本。

trans-unit.source: If the pattern attribute is specified, the content of a "password" control is only considered valid if the value passes validation; see Validation for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 pattern 属性，则仅当值通过验证时，才将 "password" 控件的内容视为有效；有关更多信息，请参见验证。

trans-unit.source: If the value is set to something which can't be converted into a valid floating-point number, validation fails because the input is suffering from a bad input.
trans-unit.target: 如果该 value 设置为无法转换为有效浮点数的值，则验证将失败，因为输入正遭受错误的输入之苦。

trans-unit.source: If the span attribute is present: none, it is an empty element.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 span 属性：none，则为空元素。

trans-unit.source: If the type attribute is set to application/opensearchdescription+xml the resource is an OpenSearch plugin that can be easily added to the interface of some browsers like Firefox or Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 type 属性设置为 application/opensearchdescription+xml ,则该资源是一个OpenSearch插件，可以轻松将其添加到Firefox或Internet Explorer等某些浏览器的界面中。

trans-unit.source: If the type is set to application/rss+xml or application/atom+xml, the link defines a syndication feed. The first one defined on the page is the default.
trans-unit.target: 如果 type 设置为 application/rss+xml 或 application/atom+xml ，则该链接定义联合供稿。页面上定义的第一个是默认值。

trans-unit.source: If the autocomplete attribute is not specified on a <textarea> element, then the browser uses the autocomplete attribute value of the <textarea> element's form owner. The form owner is either the <form> element that this <textarea> element is a descendant of or the form element whose id is specified by the form attribute of the input element. For more information, see the autocomplete attribute in <form>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未在 <textarea> 元素上指定 autocomplete 属性，则浏览器将使用 <textarea> 元素的表单所有者的 autocomplete 属性值。表单所有者是此 <textarea> 元素的后代的 <form> 元素，或者是其 id 由输入元素的 form 属性指定的form元素。有关更多信息，请参见 <form> 中的 autocomplete 属性。

trans-unit.source: If the disabled attribute isn't specified, the button inherits its disabled state from its parent element. This makes it possible to enable and disable groups of elements all at once by enclosing them in a container such as a <fieldset> element, and then setting disabled on the container.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 disabled 属性，则按钮将从其父元素继承其 disabled 状态。通过将元素组封装在诸如 <fieldset> 元素的容器中，然后在容器上设置 disabled ，可以一次启用和禁用所有元素组。

trans-unit.source: If the type attribute isn't specified, the media's type is retrieved from the server and checked to see if the user agent can handle it; if it can't be rendered, the next <source> is checked. If the type attribute is specified, it's compared against the types the user agent can present, and if it's not recognized, the server doesn't even get queried; instead, the next <source> element is checked at once.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 type 属性，则从服务器检索媒体的类型，并检查用户代理是否可以处理它；如果无法呈现，则检查下一个 <source> 。如果指定了 type 属性，则将其与用户代理可以提供的类型进行比较，如果未识别，则甚至不会查询服务器；而是一次检查下一个 <source> 元素。

trans-unit.source: If the value attribute was omitted, the default value for the checkbox is on , so the submitted data in that case would be subscribe=on.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略了 value 属性，则该复选框的默认值为 on ，因此在这种情况下，提交的数据将为 subscribe=on 。

trans-unit.source: If the HTTP header Content-Disposition: gives a different filename than this attribute, the HTTP header takes priority over this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果HTTP标头 Content-Disposition: 提供的文件名与此属性不同，则HTTP标头优先于该属性。

trans-unit.source: If the MIME type for the video is not set correctly on the server, the video may not show or show a gray box containing an X (if JavaScript is enabled).
trans-unit.target: 如果在服务器上没有正确设置视频的MIME类型,视频可能不会显示或显示一个包含X的灰色框(如果JavaScript已启用)。

trans-unit.source: If the attribute is not present, the resource is fetched without a CORS request (i.e. without sending the Origin HTTP header), preventing its non-tainted usage. If invalid, it is handled as if the enumerated keyword anonymous was used. See CORS settings attributes for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性不存在，则在没有CORS请求的情况下（即，不发送 Origin HTTP头）获取资源，从而防止资源的无污染使用。如果无效，则将其当作使用枚举关键字匿名的方式进行处理。有关其他信息，请参见CORS设置属性。

trans-unit.source: If the attribute is not present, the resource is fetched without a CORS request (i.e., without sending the Origin HTTP header), preventing its non-tainted usage in <canvas> elements. If invalid, it is handled as if the anonymous value was used. See CORS settings attributes for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性不存在，则在没有CORS请求的情况下（即，不发送 Origin HTTP头）获取资源，从而防止在 <canvas> 元素中使用该资源。如果无效，则将其当作使用 anonymous 值来处理。有关其他信息，请参见CORS设置属性。

trans-unit.source: If the attribute is not present: zero or more <col> element
trans-unit.target: 如果属性不存在：零个或多个 <col> 元素

trans-unit.source: If the attribute value is the empty string (lang=""), the language is set to unknown; if the language tag is not valid according to BCP47, it is set to invalid.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性值为空字符串（ lang="" ），则语言设置为unknown；如果语言标签根据BCP47 无效，则将其设置为invalid。

trans-unit.source: If the button is a submit button, this Boolean attribute specifies that the form is not to be validated when it is submitted. If this attribute is specified, it overrides the novalidate attribute of the button's form owner.
trans-unit.target: 如果按钮是一个提交按钮，则此布尔属性指定在提交表单时不对其进行验证。如果指定了此属性，则它将覆盖按钮的表单所有者的 novalidate 属性。

trans-unit.source: If the button is a submit button, this attribute is a name or keyword indicating where to display the response that is received after submitting the form. This is a name of, or keyword for, a browsing context (for example, tab, window, or inline frame). If this attribute is specified, it overrides the target attribute of the button's form owner. The following keywords have special meanings:

trans-unit.source: If the button is a submit button, this attribute specifies the HTTP method that the browser uses to submit the form. Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 如果按钮是一个提交按钮,这个属性指定了浏览器用来提交表单的HTTP方法。可能的值是:

trans-unit.source: If the button is a submit button, this attribute specifies the type of content that is used to submit the form to the server. Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 如果按钮是一个提交按钮,这个属性指定了用于向服务器提交表单的内容类型。可能的值是:

trans-unit.source: If the cache manifest has been updated, the browser downloads a new version of the manifest and the resources listed in the manifest. This is done in the background and does not affect performance significantly.
trans-unit.target: 如果缓存清单已更新,浏览器会下载新版本的清单和清单中列出的资源。这是在后台进行的,不会显著影响性能。

trans-unit.source: If the control is presented as a scrolling list box (e.g. when multiple is specified), this attribute represents the number of rows in the list that should be visible at one time. Browsers are not required to present a select element as a scrolled list box. The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件显示为滚动列表框（例如，当指定 multiple 时），则此属性表示列表中应一次可见的行数。浏览器不需要将选择元素显示为滚动列表框。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: If the control's content has one directionality (LTR or RTL) but needs to present the placeholder in the opposite directionality, you can use Unicode bidirectional algorithm formatting characters to override directionality within the placeholder; see Overiding BiDi using Unicode control characters in The Unicode Bidirectional Text Algorithm for those characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的内容具有一个方向性（LTR或RTL），但需要以相反的方向性显示占位符，则可以使用Unicode双向算法格式化字符来覆盖占位符中的方向性；有关这些字符，请参见Unicode双向文本算法中的使用Unicode控制字符覆盖BiDi。

trans-unit.source: If the control's content has one directionality (LTR or RTL) but needs to present the placeholder in the opposite directionality, you can use Unicode bidirectional algorithm formatting characters to override directionality within the placeholder; see Overriding BiDi using Unicode control characters in The Unicode Bidirectional Text Algorithm for those characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的内容具有一个方向性（LTR或RTL），但需要以相反的方向性显示占位符，则可以使用Unicode双向算法格式化字符来覆盖占位符中的方向性；请参阅“ Unicode双向文本算法”中的使用Unicode控制字符覆盖BiDi。

trans-unit.source: If the currently-cached copy of the manifest is up-to-date, the browser sends a noupdate event to the applicationCache object, and the update process is complete. Note that if you change any cached resources on the server, you must also change the manifest file itself, so that the browser knows it needs to fetch all the resources again.
trans-unit.target: 如果清单的当前缓存副本是最新的，则浏览器将 noupdate 事件发送到 applicationCache 对象，并且更新过程完成。请注意，如果您更改了服务器上的任何缓存资源，则还必须更改清单文件本身，以便浏览器知道它需要再次获取所有资源。

trans-unit.source: If the document is an <iframe>srcdoc document, or if title information is available from a higher level protocol, zero or more elements of metadata content.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档是 <iframe> srcdoc 文档，或者标题信息可从更高级别的协议获得，则元数据内容的元素为零或更多。

trans-unit.source: If the element has a src attribute: zero or more <track> elements followed by transparent content that contains no <audio> or <video> media elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素具有 src 属性：零个或多个 <track> 元素，后跟不包含 <audio> 或 <video> 媒体元素的透明内容。

trans-unit.source: If the element has a src attribute: zero or more <track> elements, followed by transparent content that contains no media elements–that is no <audio> or <video>
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素具有 src 属性：零个或多个 <track> 元素，然后是不包含媒体元素的透明内容，即 <audio> 或 <video>

trans-unit.source: If the element has an itemscope attribute
trans-unit.target: 如果元素具有 itemscope 属性

trans-unit.source: If the element is <a> or <area>, it indicates that the hyperlink leads to a resource giving further help about the parent of the element, and its descendants.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素是 <a> 或 <area> ，则表明超链接会导致资源提供有关该元素的父级及其后代的进一步帮助。

trans-unit.source: If the element is <link> and the rel attribute also contains the stylesheet type, the link defines an alternative style sheet; in that case the title attribute must be present and not be the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素为 <link> 并且 rel 属性也包含 stylesheet 类型，则该链接定义备用样式表；在这种情况下， title 属性必须存在且不能为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the element is <link> it indicates that the hyperlink leads to a resource giving further help about the page as a whole.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素是 <link> ,则表示超链接指向的资源会为整个页面提供进一步的帮助。

trans-unit.source: If the element is a data element
trans-unit.target: 如果元素是 data 元素

trans-unit.source: If the element is a meta element
trans-unit.target: 如果元素是 meta 元素

trans-unit.source: If the element is a meter element
trans-unit.target: 如果元素是 meter 元素

trans-unit.source: If the element is a time element
trans-unit.target: 如果元素是 time 元素

trans-unit.source: If the element is an a, area, or link element
trans-unit.target: 如果元素是 a ， area 或 link 元素

trans-unit.source: If the element is an audio, embed, iframe, img, source, track, or video element
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素是 audio ， embed ， iframe ， img ， source ， track 或 video 元素

trans-unit.source: If the element is an object element
trans-unit.target: 如果元素是 object 元素

trans-unit.source: If the element is in the context menu state: zero or more occurrences, in any order, of <menu> (context menu state only), <menuitem>, <hr>, <script>, and <template>.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素处于上下文菜单状态： <menu> （仅上下文菜单状态）， <menuitem> ， <hr> ， <script> 和 <template> （以任何顺序）零次或多次出现。

trans-unit.source: If the element is in the list menu state: flow content, or alternatively, zero or more occurrences of <li>, <script>, and <template>.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素处于列表菜单状态：流内容，或者 <li> ， <script> 和 <template> 出现零次或多次。

trans-unit.source: If the file type is invalid, we display a message inside a list item telling the user that they need to select a different file type.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件类型无效,我们会在列表项中显示一条消息,告诉用户需要选择不同的文件类型。

trans-unit.source: If the foreign content comes from an image obtained from either as HTMLCanvasElement or ImageBitMap, and the image source doesn't meet the same origin rules, attempts to read the canvas's contents are blocked.
trans-unit.target: 如果外部内容来自从 HTMLCanvasElement 或 ImageBitMap 获得的图像，并且图像源不符合相同的原始规则，则将阻止尝试读取画布内容的尝试。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a typed item it must be either:
trans-unit.target: 如果该项目是一个打字项目,它必须是任一。

trans-unit.source: If the item is not a typed item it must be:
trans-unit.target: 如果不是打字的项目就必须是。

trans-unit.source: If the manifest file has changed, all the files listed in the manifest—as well as those added to the cache by calling applicationCache.add()—are fetched into a temporary cache, following the appropriate HTTP caching rules. For each file fetched into this temporary cache, the browser sends a progress event to the applicationCache object. If any errors occur, the browser sends an error event, and the update halts.
trans-unit.target: 如果清单文件已更改，则清单中列出的所有文件，以及通过调用 applicationCache.add() 添加到缓存的文件，都将遵循适当的HTTP缓存规则被提取到临时缓存中。对于提取到此临时缓存中的每个文件，浏览器都会将 progress 事件发送到 applicationCache 对象。如果发生任何错误，浏览器将发送一个 error 事件，并且更新将暂停。

trans-unit.source: If the source of the foreign content is an HTML <img> or SVG <svg> element, attempting to retrieve the contents of the canvas isn't allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果外部内容的来源是HTML <img> 或SVG <svg> 元素，则不允许尝试检索画布的内容。

trans-unit.source: If the specified pattern is not specified or is invalid, no regular expression is applied and this attribute is ignored completely.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的模式没有被指定或无效,则不应用正则表达式,该属性将被完全忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the table cannot be broken apart, use a combination of the id and headers attributes to programmatically associate each table cell with the header(s) the cell is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法分解表，请使用 id 和 headers 属性的组合，以编程方式将每个表单元格与该单元格所关联的表头相关联。

trans-unit.source: If the table does use a colspan attribute, the effect can be achieved by combining adequate CSS attribute selectors like [colspan=n], though this is not trivial.
trans-unit.target: 如果表确实使用了 colspan 属性，则可以通过组合适当的CSS属性选择器（例如 [colspan=n] )来实现效果，尽管这并非易事。

trans-unit.source: If the table doesn't use a colspan attribute, use one td:nth-child(an+b) CSS selector per column, where a is the total number of the columns in the table and b is the ordinal position of this column in the table. Only after this selector the text-align property can be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果表不使用 colspan 属性，则每列使用一个 td:nth-child(an+b) CSS选择器，其中a是表中列的总数，b是该列在表格中的顺序位置桌子。仅在此选择器之后，才能使用 text-align 属性。

trans-unit.source: If the table doesn't use a colspan attribute, use the td:nth-child(an+b) CSS selector per column, where a is the total number of the columns in the table and b is the ordinal position of the column in the table. Only after this selector the vertical-align property can be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果表不使用 colspan 属性，则每列使用 td:nth-child(an+b) CSS选择器，其中a是表中列的总数，b是列在表中的顺序位置桌子。仅在此选择器之后，才能使用 vertical-align 属性。

trans-unit.source: If the table doesn't use a colspan attribute, use the td:nth-child(an+b) CSS selector where a is the total number of the columns in the table and b is the ordinal position of the column in the table. Only after this selector the vertical-align property can be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果表不使用 colspan 属性，请使用 td:nth-child(an+b) CSS选择器，其中a是表中列的总数，b是表中列的顺序位置。仅在此选择器之后，才能使用 vertical-align 属性。

trans-unit.source: If the table doesn't use a colspan attribute, use the td:nth-child(an+b) CSS selector. Set a to zero and b to the position of the column in the table, e.g. td:nth-child(2) { text-align: right; } to right-align the second column.
trans-unit.target: 如果表不使用 colspan 属性，请使用 td:nth-child(an+b) CSS选择器。将 a 设置为零，将 b 设置为表中列的位置，例如 td:nth-child(2) { text-align: right; } 以使第二列右对齐。

trans-unit.source: If the table includes a <thead> block (to semantically identify header rows), the <tbody> block must come after it.
trans-unit.target: 如果表中包含一个 <thead> 块（从语义上标识标题行），则 <tbody> 块必须紧随其后。

trans-unit.source: If the user can't understand your form if the placeholders are missing (say, in a browser that doesn't support placeholder, or in the case above where the user starts typing then gets confused), you're not using placeholders properly.
trans-unit.target: 如果在缺少 placeholder 的情况下用户不理解您的表单（例如，在不支持占位符的浏览器中，或者在上述情况下用户开始输入然后感到困惑），则说明您没有正确使用占位符。

trans-unit.source: If the user's browser doesn't support type "range", it will fall back and treat it as a "text" input.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户的浏览器不支持 "range" 类型，它将退回并将其视为 "text" 输入。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this attribute is set to yes, the definition text will not wrap. The default value is no.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值设置为 yes ，则定义文本将不换行。默认值为 no 。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple <link rel="icon">s, the browser uses their media, type, and sizes attributes to select the most appropriate icon. If several icons are equally appropriate, the last one is used. If the most appropriate icon is later found to be inappropriate, for example because it uses an unsupported format, the browser proceeds to the next-most appropriate, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个 <link rel="icon"> ，则浏览器将使用其 media ， type 和 sizes 属性来选择最合适的图标。如果几个图标同样合适，则使用最后一个。如果以后发现最合适的图标不合适，例如因为使用了不受支持的格式，则浏览器将转到次最合适的图标，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If there is no semantic purpose to using the <b> element, you should use the CSS font-weight property with the value "bold" instead in order to make text bold.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 <b> 元素没有语义目的，则应将CSS font-weight 属性使用值 "bold" 代替，以使文本变为粗体。

trans-unit.source: If this Boolean attribute is set, all form controls that are descendants of the <fieldset>, are disabled, meaning they are not editable and won't be submitted along with the <form>. They won't receive any browsing events, like mouse clicks or focus-related events. By default browsers display such controls grayed out. Note that form elements inside the <legend> element won't be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此Boolean属性，则所有 <fieldset> 后代的表单控件都将被禁用，这意味着它们不可编辑，并且不会与 <form> 一起提交。他们不会收到任何浏览事件，例如鼠标单击或与焦点相关的事件。默认情况下，浏览器将此类控件显示为灰色。请注意，不会禁用 <legend> 元素内的form元素。

trans-unit.source: If this Boolean attribute is set, none of the items in this option group is selectable. Often browsers grey out such control and it won't receive any browsing events, like mouse clicks or focus-related ones.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个布尔属性,这个选项组中的项目都不能选择。通常浏览器会将这种控件灰度化,它不会收到任何浏览事件,比如鼠标点击或焦点相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: If this Boolean attribute is set, this option is not checkable. Often browsers grey out such control and it won't receive any browsing event, like mouse clicks or focus-related ones. If this attribute is not set, the element can still be disabled if one of its ancestors is a disabled <optgroup> element.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此布尔属性，则此选项不可检查。浏览器通常会使这种控制变灰，并且它不会收到任何浏览事件，例如鼠标单击或与焦点相关的事件。如果未设置此属性，则如果其祖先之一是禁用的 <optgroup> 元素，则仍可以禁用该元素。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is not set, its default value is "text", indicating that the locale's standard text entry keyboard should be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则其默认值为 "text" ，指示应使用语言环境的标准文本输入键盘。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is not set, its default value is auto, meaning the behavior should be the one defined by default by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则其默认值为 auto ，这意味着行为应为浏览器默认定义的行为。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is not set, its default value is inherited from its parent element.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则其默认值将从其父元素继承。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is not set, its default value is element-type and browser-defined. This default value may also be inherited, which means that the element content will be checked for spelling errors only if its nearest ancestor has a spellcheck state of true.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则其默认值为element-type和浏览器定义。此默认值也可以被继承，这意味着仅在元素内容的最接近祖先的拼写检查状态为 true 时,才检查元素内容的拼写错误。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is not set, its value is inherited from the align of the <colgroup> element this <col> element belongs too. If there are none, the left value is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置该属性，其值是从继承 align 的的 <colgroup> 元素此 <col> 元素属于太。如果不存在，则假定为 left 值。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is not set, the left value is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则假定为 left 值。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is not set, the left value is assumed. The descendant <col> elements may override this value using their own align attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则假定为 left 值。后代 <col> 元素可以使用其自己的 align 属性覆盖此值。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is not specified, soft is its default value.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则 soft 为默认值。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is omitted, it means that the title of the nearest ancestor of this element is still relevant (and could be used as the tooltip for that element). If this attribute is set to the empty string, it explicitly means its nearest ancestor's title is not relevant (and shouldn't be used in the tooltip for this element).
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性被省略,则意味着该元素最近的祖先的标题仍然是相关的(可以作为该元素的工具提示)。如果该属性被设置为空字符串,则明确表示其最近的祖先的标题不相关(不应该用于该元素的工具提示)。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is present, the browser will offer controls to allow the user to control audio playback, including volume, seeking, and pause/resume playback.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个属性存在,浏览器将提供控制功能,让用户控制音频播放,包括音量、寻找和暂停/恢复播放。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is present, the browser will offer controls to allow the user to control video playback, including volume, seeking, and pause/resume playback.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性存在,浏览器将提供控制功能,允许用户控制视频播放,包括音量、寻找和暂停/恢复播放。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is specified, it overrides the enctype attribute of the element's form owner.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了此属性，它将覆盖元素的表单所有者的 enctype 属性。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is specified, it overrides the enctype attribute of the button's form owner.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了此属性，它将覆盖按钮的表单所有者的 enctype 属性。

trans-unit.source: If used in combination with the alternate keyword, it defines an alternative style sheet; in that case the title attribute must be present and not be the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果与 alternate 关键字结合使用，它将定义一个替代样式表；在这种情况下， title 属性必须存在且不能为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If we left things at that, we would at least be validating on legitimate e-mail addresses. But we want to go one step farther: we want to make sure that the e-mail address is in fact in the form "username@beststartupever.com". This is where we'll use pattern. We set pattern to .+@beststartupever.com. This simple regular expression requests a string that consists of at least one character of any kind, then an "@" followed by the domain name "beststartupever.com".
trans-unit.target: 如果我们保留这些内容，那么至少将在合法的电子邮件地址上进行验证。但是，我们想走的更远：我们要确保电子邮件地址的格式实际上是“ username @ beststartupever.com”。这是我们将使用 pattern 的地方。我们将 pattern 设置为 .+@beststartupever.com 。这个简单的正则表达式要求一个字符串，该字符串包含至少一个任何类型的字符，然后是“ @”，后跟域名“ beststartupever.com”。

trans-unit.source: If you choose to use <button> elements to create the buttons in your form, keep this in mind: if there's only one <button> inside the <form>, that button will be treated as the "submit" button. So you should be in the habit of expressly specifying which button is the submit button.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择使用 <button> 元素在表单中创建按钮，请记住：如果 <form> 内只有一个 <button> >，则该按钮将被视为“提交”按钮。因此，您应该养成明确指定哪个按钮是“提交”按钮的习惯。

trans-unit.source: If you display this in a web browser it should look like the following.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在网络浏览器中显示这个,它应该看起来像下面。

trans-unit.source: If you don't specify a value, the button will have a default label, chosen by the user agent. This label is likely to be something along the lines of "Submit" or "Submit Query." Here's an example of a submit button with a default label in your browser:
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 value ，则按钮将具有由用户代理选择的默认标签。此标签可能类似于“提交”或“提交查询”。这是浏览器中带有默认标签的提交按钮的示例：

trans-unit.source: If you don't specify a value, you get an button with the default label (typically "Reset," but this will vary depending on the user agent):
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定 value ，则将获得一个带有默认标签的按钮（通常为“ Reset”，但这取决于用户代理而有所不同）：

trans-unit.source: If you don't specify a value, you get an empty button:
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定 value ，则会得到一个空按钮：

trans-unit.source: If you don't specify a value, the default is "#000000", which is black. The value must be in seven-character hexadecimal notation, meaning the "#" character followed by two digits each representing red, green, and blue, like this: "#rrggbb". If you have colors that are in any other format (such as CSS color names or CSS color functions such as rgb() or rgba(), you'll have to convert them to hexadecimal before setting the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定值，则默认值为 "#000000" ，即黑色。该值必须采用七个字符的十六进制表示法，表示“＃”字符后跟两位数字，每个数字分别代表红色，绿色和蓝色，例如： "#rrggbb" 。如果您使用其他任何格式的颜色（例如CSS颜色名称或CSS颜色函数，例如 rgb() 或 rgba() )，则必须在设置 value 之前将它们转换为十六进制。

trans-unit.source: If you don't specify the controls attribute, the audio player won't include the browser's default controls; you can create your own custom controls using JavaScript and the HTMLMediaElement API.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定 controls 属性，则音频播放器将不包含浏览器的默认控件；您可以使用JavaScript和 HTMLMediaElement API 创建自己的自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: If you don't specify the controls attribute, the video won't include the browser's default controls; you can create your own custom controls using JavaScript and the HTMLMediaElement API. See Creating a cross-browser video player for more details.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定 controls 属性，则视频将不包含浏览器的默认控件；您可以使用JavaScript和 HTMLMediaElement API 创建自己的自定义控件。有关更多详细信息，请参见创建跨浏览器的视频播放器。

trans-unit.source: If you encounter code that is mistakenly using <var> for style purposes rather than semantic purposes, you should either use a <span> with appropriate CSS or, an appropriate semantic element among the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到出于风格目的而不是语义目的错误地使用 <var> 的代码，则应在适当的CSS中使用 <span> ，或者在以下内容中使用适当的语义元素：

trans-unit.source: If you feel like you need to use a placeholder, it's possible to use both a placeholder and a label:
trans-unit.target: 如果你觉得需要使用占位符,可以同时使用占位符和标签。

trans-unit.source: If you include an id attribute on the <dfn> element, you can then link to it using <a> elements. Such links should be uses of the term, with the intent being that the reader can quickly navigate to the term's definition if they're not already aware of it, by clicking on the term's link.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <dfn> 元素上包含 id 属性，则可以使用 <a> 元素链接到该属性。这样的链接应该是术语的使用，目的是使读者可以通过单击术语的链接来快速导航到该术语的定义（如果他们尚不知道的话）。

trans-unit.source: If you include multiple <style> and <link> elements in your document, they will be applied to the DOM in the order they are included in the document — make sure you include them in the correct order, to avoid unexpected cascade issues.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在文档中包含多个 <style> 和 <link> 元素，它们将按照它们在文档中包含的顺序应用于DOM-确保以正确的顺序包含它们，以避免意外的级联问题。

trans-unit.source: If you know the directionality of EMBEDDED-TEXT in advance, you can fix this problem by wrapping EMBEDDED-TEXT in a <span> with the dir attribute set to the known directionality. But if you don't know the directionality - for example because EMBEDDED-TEXT is being read from a database or entered by the user - you should use <bdi> to prevent the directionality of EMBEDDED-TEXT from affecting its surroundings.
trans-unit.target: 如果您事先知道 EMBEDDED-TEXT 的方向性，则可以通过将 EMBEDDED-TEXT 包装在 <span> 中，并将 dir 属性设置为已知的方向性来解决此问题。但是，如果您不知道方向性（例如，由于正在从数据库读取 EMBEDDED-TEXT 或由用户输入），则应使用 <bdi> 来防止 EMBEDDED-TEXT 的方向性影响其周围环境。

trans-unit.source: If you need an element which will serve as a container for output generated by your web site or app's JavaScript code, you should instead use the <output> element.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要一个元素来充当网站或应用程序的JavaScript代码生成的输出的容器，则应改用 <output> 元素。

trans-unit.source: If you need the entered URL to be restricted further than just "any string that looks like a URL," you can use the pattern attribute to specify a regular expression the value must match for the value to be valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要限制输入的URL，而不仅仅是“看起来像URL的任何字符串”，则可以使用 pattern 属性指定一个正则表达式，该值必须匹配才能使该值有效。

trans-unit.source: If you need the entered e-mail address to be restricted further than just "any string that looks like an e-mail address," you can use the pattern attribute to specify a regular expression the value must match for it to be valid. If the multiple attribute is specified, each individual item in the comma-delineated list of values must match the regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要限制输入的电子邮件地址，而不仅仅是“任何看起来像电子邮件地址的字符串”，则可以使用 pattern 属性指定一个正则表达式，该值必须匹配才能有效。如果指定了 multiple 属性，则逗号分隔的值列表中的每个单独项都必须与正则表达式匹配。

trans-unit.source: If you omit the value attribute in the HTML, the submitted form data assigns the value "on" to the group. In this scenario, if the user clicked on the "Phone" option and submitted the form, the resulting form data would be "contact=on", which isn't helpful. So don't forget to set your value attributes!
trans-unit.target: 如果您在HTML中省略了 value 属性，则提交的表单数据会将值 "on" 分配给该组。在这种情况下，如果用户单击“电话”选项并提交表单，则结果表单数据将为 "contact=on" ，这没有帮助。因此，不要忘记设置您的 value 属性！

trans-unit.source: If you really do need a polyfill, then you can use the following CSS polyfill. Works in IE10+.
trans-unit.target: 如果你真的需要一个polyfill,那么你可以使用以下CSS polyfill。可在IE10+中使用。

trans-unit.source: If you serve XHTML-like content using the text/html MIME type, browsers will read it as HTML, and you will need the DOCTYPE to use standards mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 text/html MIME类型提供类似XHTML的内容，则浏览器会将其读取为HTML，并且您将需要DOCTYPE才能使用标准模式。

trans-unit.source: If you serve your page as XHTML using the application/xhtml+xml MIME type in the Content-Type HTTP header, you do not need a DOCTYPE to enable standards mode, as such documents always use full standards mode. Note however that serving your pages as application/xhtml+xml will cause Internet Explorer 8 to show a download dialog box for an unknown format instead of displaying your page, as the first version of Internet Explorer with support for XHTML is Internet Explorer 9.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 Content-Type HTTP标头中的 application/xhtml+xml MIME类型将页面用作XHTML，则不需要DOCTYPE来启用标准模式，因为此类文档始终使用完全标准模式。但是请注意，将页面用作 application/xhtml+xml 将导致Internet Explorer 8 显示未知格式的下载对话框，而不是显示页面，因为支持XHTML的Internet Explorer的第一个版本是Internet Explorer 9。

trans-unit.source: If you serve your videos as WebM, you can fix this problem for the Apache Web Server by adding the extension used by your video files (".webm" is the most common one) to the MIME type "video/webm" via the "mime.types" file in "/etc/apache" or via the "AddType" configuration directive in httpd.conf.
trans-unit.target: 如果您将视频用作WebM，则可以通过以下方式将视频文件使用的扩展名（“ .webm”是最常用的扩展名）添加到MIME类型“ video / webm”中，从而解决Apache Web Server的此问题。 “ / etc / apache”中的mime.types”文件，或通过 httpd.conf 中的“ AddType”配置指令。

trans-unit.source: If you set the tabindex attribute on an <div>, then its child content cannot be scrolled with the arrow keys unless you set tabindex on the content, too. Check out this fiddle to understand the scrolling effects of tabindex.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <div> 上设置了 tabindex 属性，那么除非您也在内容上设置了 tabindex ，否则无法使用箭头键滚动其子内容。查看此小提琴，以了解 tabindex 的滚动效果。

trans-unit.source: If you try submitting it, you'll see that non-supporting browsers now display an error message (and highlight the input as invalid) if your entry doesn't match the pattern nn:nn, where n is a number from 0 to 9. Of course, this doesn't stop people from entering invalid times, or incorrectly formatted times that follow the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果您尝试提交，则将看到不支持的浏览器现在显示错误消息（并将输入内容突出显示为无效），如果您输入的内容与 nn:nn 模式不匹配，其中 n 是0到9之间的数字当然，这不会阻止人们输入无效时间或遵循该格式的错误格式的时间。

trans-unit.source: If you try submitting it, you'll see that the browser now displays an error message (and highlights the input as invalid) if your entry doesn't match the pattern nnnn-nn-nn, where n is a number from 0 to 9. Of course, this doesn't stop people from entering invalid dates, or incorrectly formatted dates, such as yyyy-dd-mm (whereas we want yyyy-mm-dd). So we still have a problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试提交，则输入内容与 nnnn-nn-nn 模式不匹配时，浏览器现在将显示一条错误消息（并将输入突出显示为无效），其中 n 是0到9之间的数字当然，这不会阻止人们输入无效日期或格式错误的日期，例如 yyyy-dd-mm （而我们需要 yyyy-mm-dd ）。所以我们仍然有一个问题。

trans-unit.source: If you try submitting it, you'll see that the browser now displays an error message (and highlights the input as invalid) if your entry doesn't match the pattern nnnn-nn-nnTnn:nn, where n is a number from 0 to 9. Of course, this doesn't stop people from entering invalid dates, or incorrectly formatted dates and times.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试提交，则输入内容与 nnnn-nn-nnTnn:nn 模式不匹配时，浏览器现在将显示一条错误消息（并将输入突出显示为无效），其中 n 是从0开始的数字到9。当然，这不会阻止人们输入无效的日期或格式错误的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: If you try submitting it, you'll see that the browser now displays an error message (and highlights the input as invalid) if your entry doesn't match the pattern nnnn-nn, where n is a number from 0 to 9. Of course, this doesn't stop people from entering invalid dates (such as "0000-42"), or incorrectly formatted dates that follow the pattern.

trans-unit.source: If you try to submit the form with less than 4 characters, you'll be given an appropriate error message (which differs between browsers). If you try to go beyond 8 characters in length, the browser won't let you.

trans-unit.source: If you use <tbody>, you can't also have table rows (<tr> elements) which are direct children of the <table> but not included inside the <tbody>. All non-header and non-footer rows must be inside the <tbody> if one is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 <tbody> ，则也不能具有表行（ <tr> 元素），这些行是 <table> 的直接子级，但不包含在 <tbody> 内。如果使用了一个，则所有非页眉和非页脚行都必须位于 <tbody> 内。

trans-unit.source: If you use min and max to restrict the available dates (see Setting maximum and minimum dates), supporting browsers will display an error if you try to submit a date that is outside the set bounds. However, you'll have to check the results to be sure the value is within these dates, since they're only enforced if the date picker is fully supported on the user's device.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 min 和 max 来限制可用日期（请参阅设置最大和最小日期），则当您尝试提交超出设置范围的日期时，支持的浏览器将显示错误。但是，您必须检查结果以确保该值在这些日期之内，因为只有在用户设备上完全支持日期选择器时才强制执行这些结果。

trans-unit.source: If you use Apache Web Server to serve Ogg Theora videos, you can fix this problem by adding the video file type extensions to "video/ogg" MIME type. The most common video file type extensions are ".ogm", ".ogv", or ".ogg". To do this, edit the "mime.types" file in "/etc/apache" or use the "AddType" configuration directive in httpd.conf.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用Apache Web Server提供Ogg Theora视频，则可以通过将视频文件类型扩展名添加到“ video / ogg” MIME类型来解决此问题。最常见的视频文件类型扩展名是“ .ogm”，“。ogv”或“ .ogg”。为此，请编辑“ / etc / apache”中的“ mime.types”文件或使用 httpd.conf 中的 "AddType" 配置指令。

trans-unit.source: If you use a <base> element to override the base URI of your page, put the element in the non-scripted part of the document. Don't add it via document.write() or document.createElement().
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 <base> 元素覆盖页面的基本URI，则将该元素放在文档的非脚本部分中。不要通过 document.write() 或 document.createElement() 添加它。

trans-unit.source: If you want default content for your <textarea>, you enter it between the opening and closing tags. <textarea> does not support the value attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果要 <textarea> 的默认内容，请在开始标记和结束标记之间输入。 <textarea> 不支持 value 属性。

trans-unit.target: 如果要进一步限制输入的数字，以便它们也必须符合特定的模式，则可以使用 pattern 属性，该属性将输入值必须匹配的正则表达式作为其值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to remove a page, noindex will work, but only after the robot visits the page again. Ensure that the robots.txt file is not preventing revisits.

trans-unit.source: If you want to visually hide the button's text, an accessible way to do so is to use a combination of properties to remove it visually from the screen but keep it parseable by assistive technology.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在视觉上隐藏按钮的文本，一种可访问的方法是使用属性的组合从屏幕上直观地将其删除，但通过辅助技术使其可解析。

trans-unit.source: If you're new to Web development, be sure to read our HTML Basics article to learn what HTML is and how to use it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不熟悉Web开发，请务必阅读我们的HTML基础知识文章，以了解什么是HTML以及如何使用它。

trans-unit.source: If you're unhappy with the color that's proposed to you, you can change the color scheme, to see if you find something you like better. For example, if we don't like the proposed greenish-blue color, we can click the Triad color scheme icon, which presents us with the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果你对提出的颜色不满意,可以改变一下配色方案,看看是否找到更喜欢的颜色。例如,如果我们不喜欢建议的绿色蓝色,我们可以点击三色堇配色方案图标,它呈现给我们的是。

trans-unit.source: If you've got your sites' CORS settings worked out properly, you can successfully preload cross-origin resources as long as you set a crossorigin attribute on your <link> element.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的网站的CORS设置已正确解决，则只要在 <link> 元素上设置 crossorigin 属性，就可以成功预加载跨域资源。

trans-unit.source: If your application has character set restrictions or any other requirement for the actual content of the entered password, you can use the pattern attribute to establish a regular expression to be used to automatically ensure that your passwords meet those requirements.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的应用程序对输入的密码的实际内容有字符集限制或任何其他要求，则可以使用 pattern 属性建立一个正则表达式，以自动确保您的密码满足这些要求。

trans-unit.source: If your background colors and images have been selected carefully and/or are crucial to the usefulness of the content, you can use the CSS color-adjust property to tell the browser that it should not make adjustments to the appearance of content.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经仔细选择了背景颜色和图像和/或对于内容的有用性至关重要，则可以使用CSS color-adjust 属性告诉浏览器不要对内容的外观进行调整。

trans-unit.source: If your buttons are not to submit form data to a server, be sure to set their type attribute to button. Otherwise they will try to submit form data and to load the (nonexistent) response, possibly destroying the current state of the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的按钮不是要向服务器提交表单数据，请确保将其 type 属性设置为 button 。否则，他们将尝试提交表单数据并加载（不存在）响应，这可能会破坏文档的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: If your canvas does not use transparency, you can tell the browser that your canvas is opaque, this will be used internally to optimize rendering. To do this, set alpha to false when getting the drawing context:
trans-unit.target: 如果您的画布不使用透明，则可以告诉浏览器您的画布是不透明的，这将在内部用于优化渲染。为此，在获取绘图上下文时将 alpha 设置为 false ：

trans-unit.source: If your recommended (or required) password syntax rules would benefit from an alternate text entry interface than the standard keyboard, you can use the inputmode attribute to request a specific one. The most obvious use case for this is if the password is required to be numeric (such as a PIN). Mobile devices with virtual keyboards, for example, may opt to switch to a numeric keypad layout instead of a full keyboard, to make entering the password easier. If the PIN is for one-time use, set the autocomplete attribute to off to suggest that it's not saved.
trans-unit.target: 如果推荐的（或必需的）密码语法规则比标准的键盘受益于备用文本输入界面，则可以使用 inputmode 属性来请求特定的密码。最明显的用例是要求密码为数字（例如PIN）。例如，带有虚拟键盘的移动设备可能会选择切换到数字键盘布局而不是完整键盘，从而使输入密码更加容易。如果PIN是一次性使用的，请将 autocomplete 属性设置为 off ,以表明未保存它。

trans-unit.target: 在2016年，已提出从规范中删除 isindex 。

trans-unit.source: In Chrome and Opera, which are the only browsers to show up/down iteration arrows, clicking the arrows changes the seconds value by two seconds, but doesn't affect the hours or minutes. Minutes (or hours) can only be used for stepping when you specify a number of minutes (or hours) in seconds, such as 120 for 2 minutes, or 7200 for 2 hours).
trans-unit.target: 在Chrome和Opera这两个浏览器中,只有这两个浏览器会显示上/下迭代箭头,点击箭头会使秒值改变两秒,但不影响小时或分钟。分(或小时)只有在指定以秒为单位的分钟(或小时)数时才能用于步进,如120为2分钟,或7200为2小时)。

trans-unit.source: In Chrome you can clear the offline cache by selecting "Clear browsing data..." in the preferences or by visiting chrome://appcache-internals/. Safari has a similar "Empty cache" setting in its preferences but a browser restart may also be required.
trans-unit.target: 在Chrome中，您可以通过在首选项中选择“清除浏览数据...”或访问chrome：// appcache-internals /来清除离线缓存。Safari在首选项中具有类似的“空缓存”设置，但可能还需要重新启动浏览器。

trans-unit.source: In Chrome/Opera the time control is simple, with slots to enter hours and minutes (in 24-hour format), and up and down arrows to increment and decrement the currently selected component. An "X" button is provided to clear the control's value.
trans-unit.target: 在Chrome / Opera中， time 控制很简单，其中的插槽用于输入小时和分钟（以24小时格式），而上下箭头则用于增加和减少当前选定的组件。提供了“ X”按钮以清除控件的值。

trans-unit.source: In Chrome/Opera the week control provides slots to fill in week and year values, a pop-up calendar interface to select them more visually, and an "X" button to clear the control's value.
trans-unit.target: 在Chrome / Opera中，“ week 控件提供了用于填写周和年值的插槽，用于更直观地选择它们的弹出日历界面以及“ X”按钮，用于清除控件的值。

trans-unit.source: In Firefox the current status of the offline cache can be inspected on the about:cache page (under the "Offline cache device" heading). The offline cache can be cleared for each site separately using the "Remove..." button in Tools -> Options -> Advanced -> Network -> Offline data.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox中，可以在 about:cache 页面（在“离线缓存设备”标题下）检查离线缓存的当前状态。使用工具->选项->高级->网络->离线数据中的“删除...”按钮，可以分别清除每个站点的离线缓存。

trans-unit.source: In Firefox, select View Page Info from the context menu, and look for Render Mode.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox中，从上下文菜单中选择“ 查看页面信息 ”，然后查找“ 渲染模式”。

trans-unit.source: In Firefox, the offline cache data is stored separately from the Firefox profile—next to the regular disk cache:
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox中，脱机缓存数据与Firefox配置文件分开存储-常规磁盘缓存旁边：

trans-unit.source: In Firefox, there are no arrows, so the step value isn't used. However, providing it does add the seconds input area adjacent to the minutes section.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox中，没有箭头，因此不使用 step 值。但是，提供它确实会在分钟部分旁边添加秒输入区域。

trans-unit.source: In HTML 4, this can only be a simple white-space-separated list of media description literals, i.e., media types and groups, where defined and allowed as values for this attribute, such as print, screen, aural, braille. HTML5 extended this to any kind of media queries, which are a superset of the allowed values of HTML 4.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML 4中，这只能是一个简单的用空格分隔的媒体描述文字列表，即媒体类型和媒体组，其中定义并允许将其作为该属性的值，例如 print ， screen ， aural ， braille 。HTML5将此扩展到了任何类型的媒体查询，它们是HTML 4允许值的超集。

trans-unit.source: In HTML 5 and later, <noframes> is obsolete and shouldn't be used, since the <frame> and <frameset> elements are also obsolete. When frames are needed at all, they should be presented using the <iframe> element.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML 5和更高版本中， <noframes> 已过时，不应使用，因为 <frame> 和 <frameset> 元素也已过时。如果根本不需要框架，则应使用 <iframe> 元素进行呈现。

trans-unit.source: In HTML 5, what was previously called block-level content is now called flow content.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML 5中，以前称为块级内容的内容现在称为流内容。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, link types indicate the relationship between two documents, in which one links to the other using an <a>, <area>, or <link> element.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML中，链接类型指示两个文档之间的关系，其中一个文档使用 <a> ， <area> 或 <link> 元素链接到另一文档。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, most attributes have two faces: the content attribute and the IDL attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML中，大多数属性都有两面：content属性和IDL属性。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the following link types indicate the relationship between two documents, in which one links to the other using an <a>, <area>, or <link> element.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML中，以下链接类型指示两个文档之间的关系，其中一个使用<a>，<area>或<link>元素链接到另一个。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, various link types can be used to establish and define the relationship between two documents. Link elements that types can be set on include <a>, <area> and <link>.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML中，可以使用各种链接类型来建立和定义两个文档之间的关系。可以设置类型的链接元素包括 <a> ， <area> 和 <link> 。

trans-unit.source: In HTML4, the values are numbers of pixels or percentages, if a percent sign (%) is appended; in HTML5, the values are numbers of CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML4中,如果附加百分号(%),数值是像素数或百分比;在HTML5中,数值是CSS像素数。

trans-unit.source: In HTML5, some HTML elements which provide support for CORS, such as <img>, <video> or <script>, have a crossorigin attribute (crossOrigin property), which lets you configure the CORS requests for the element's fetched data. trans-unit.source: In HTML5, the only purpose of the DOCTYPE is to activate full standards mode. Older versions of the HTML standard gave additional meaning to the DOCTYPE, but no browser has ever used the DOCTYPE for anything other than switching between quirks mode and standards mode.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the usual events supported by HTML elements, the <details> element supports the toggle event, which is dispatched to the <details> element whenever its state changes between open and closed. It is sent after the state is changed, although if the state changes multiple times before the browser can dispatch the event, the events are coalesced so that only one is sent.
trans-unit.target: 除了HTML元素支持的常规事件之外， <details> 元素还支持 toggle 事件，只要其状态在打开和关闭之间发生变化，该事件便会调度到 <details> 元素。它是在状态更改后发送的，尽管如果在浏览器可以分派事件之前状态发生了多次更改，事件也会合并在一起，因此只发送一个。

Then we can create a class for each of the two boxes that defines the propeties that differ between the two.

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the HTML specification, the <i> element was merely a presentational element used to display text in italics, much like the <b> element was used to display text in bold letters. This is no longer true, as these tags now define semantics rather than typographic appearance. A browser will typically still display the contents of the <i> element in italic type, but is, by definition, no longer required to.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML规范的早期版本中， <i> 元素只是用于以斜体显示文本的表示性元素，就像 <b> 元素用于以粗体字母显示文本一样。这不再是正确的，因为这些标记现在定义了语义而不是印刷外观。浏览器通常仍将以斜体显​​示<i>元素的内容，但根据定义，不再需要。

trans-unit.source: In general, browsers will attempt to map this to <img>, but only if the src attribute is specified as well. However, if the element is created with a src attribute, the result is instead an HTMLImageElement and its local element name is changed to "img".

trans-unit.source: In older browsers that don't support the async attribute, parser-inserted scripts block the parser; script-inserted scripts execute asynchronously in IE and WebKit, but synchronously in Opera and pre-4 Firefox. In Firefox 4, the async DOM property defaults to true for script-created scripts, so the default behaviour matches the behaviour of IE and WebKit.
trans-unit.target: 在不支持 async 属性的旧版浏览器中，插入解析器的脚本会阻止解析器；插入脚本的脚本在IE和WebKit中异步执行，但在Opera和4之前的Firefox中同步执行。在Firefox 4中，对于脚本创建的脚本， async DOM属性默认为 true ，因此默认行为与IE和WebKit的行为匹配。

trans-unit.source: In order to create dynamic content and Web applications, HTML supports the use of scripting languages, most prominently JavaScript. Certain elements support this capability.

trans-unit.source: In order to represent a color in CSS, you have to find a way to translate the analog concept of "color" into a digital form that a computer can use. This is typically done by breaking down the color into components, such as how much of each of a set of primary colors to mix together, or how bright to make the color. As such, there are several ways you can describe color in CSS.
trans-unit.target: 为了在CSS中表示一种颜色,你必须找到一种方法将 "颜色 "的模拟概念转化为计算机可以使用的数字形式。这通常是通过将颜色分解成组件来实现的,比如一组原色中每一种颜色的多少混合在一起,或者使颜色的亮度达到多少。因此,在CSS中,有几种方法可以描述颜色。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the <hgroup> element prevents any of its secondary <h1>–<h6> children from creating separate sections of their own in the outline—as those <h1>–<h6> elements otherwise normally would if they were not children of any <hgroup>.
trans-unit.target: 换句话说， <hgroup> 元素可防止其任何第二个 <h1>–<h6> 子级在大纲中创建自己的单独部分，就像那些 <h1>–<h6> 元素否则通常不会创建这些部分一样。任何 <hgroup> 的子级。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, search engines covering specific regions may provide locally-specific extensions of microdata. For example, Yandex, a major search engine in Russia, supports microformats such as hCard (company contact information), hRecipe (food recipe), hReview (market reviews) and hProduct (product data) and provides its own format for the definition of the terms and encyclopedic articles. This extension was made to solve transliteration problems between the Cyrillic and Latin alphabets. Due to the implementation of additional marking parameters of Schema's vocabulary, the indexation of information in Russian-language web-pages became considerably more successful.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，覆盖特定区域的搜索引擎可能会提供微数据的本地特定扩展。例如，俄罗斯主要的搜索引擎Yandex支持微格式，例如hCard（公司联系信息），hRecipe（食品食谱），hReview（市场评论）和hProduct（产品数据），并提供了自己的格式来定义术语和百科全书。进行此扩展是为了解决西里尔字母和拉丁字母之间的音译问题。由于实施了Schema词汇表的附加标记参数，俄语网页中的信息索引变得相当成功。

trans-unit.source: In the above examples, you may have noticed that you can select a radio button by clicking on its associated <label> element, as well as on the radio button itself. This is a really useful feature of HTML form labels that makes it easier for users to click the option they want, especially on small-screen devices like smartphones.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中，您可能已经注意到，可以通过单击与其关联的 <label> 元素以及单选按钮本身来选择一个单选按钮。这是HTML表单标签的一项非常有用的功能，它使用户可以更轻松地单击所需的选项，尤其是在智能手机等小屏幕设备上。

trans-unit.source: In the above examples, you may have noticed that you can toggle a checkbox by clicking on its associated <label> element as well as on the checkbox itself. This is a really useful feature of HTML form labels that makes it easier to click the option you want, especially on small-screen devices like smartphones.
trans-unit.target: 在以上示例中，您可能已经注意到，可以通过单击与其关联的 <label> 元素以及复选框本身来切换复选框。这是HTML表单标签的一项非常有用的功能，它使单击所需选项更加容易，尤其是在智能手机等小屏幕设备上。
